cvar.name: ARCOM
cvar.summary: The command line used to generate a static library from object files.

cvar.name: ARCOMSTR
cvar.summary:
The string displayed when an object file is generated from an assembly-language source file. If this is not set, then &cv-ARCOM; (the command line) is displayed.
env = Environment(ARCOMSTR = "Archiving $TARGET")

cvar.name: ARFLAGS
cvar.summary: General options passed to the static library archiver.

cvar.name: RANLIBFLAGS
cvar.summary: General options passed to the archive indexer.
